constituent: leaf, flowers, Tarzan, generation, tree, wood
heisigStory: Three elements are given here: flower . . . generation . . . tree. The first and last seem logical enough, since it is the leaf that feeds the flowers on a tree. The element for generation interposed between the two suggests that the movement of a tree from one generation to the next is like its "turning over a new leaf."
koohiiStory1: On top of the leaves a flower appears, promising new generations for the old tree below.
koohiiStory2: The flower generation spent far too much time up trees trying to smoke leaves.
myStory: lá. thế hệ cỏ và cây có chung đặc điểm là lá
words: fallen leaves, leaf litter, defoliation, shedding leaves
